nodes.bodyText: Can you please put params in an object updateViewSuccess({ id, data, isModal }) {
Is there a reason why you commented this ? This might ring a bell in case of valid uncaughtException situation within the components unit/functional testing.

If there's an uncaught exception in the app, it will be thrown in the console. But in case of tests - not always. Also right now there are some minor problems (promises not finished before the test is done) that are polluting the log, but I don't have time to look into.
